p: 1.5 ml of 1% HCl was added to 4.5 ml of each concentrated ethanolic extract in different test tubes. Each mixture was heated and shaken for 2 min in a water bath. It was then cooled and filtered. The resulting filtrate was tested with Dragendorff's reagent for the presence of alkaloids as described by Adachukwu et al. [ 34]. 1 ml of the filtrate was added to 0.4 ml of Dragendorff's reagent. The formation of cream yellow precipitate indicated the presence of alkaloids.
